english.segment1: (Verse 1). Like calm comes to a sea. Like snowfall quietly. You come to me
english.segment2: Like justice to the weak. Like a flood rising. You come, You come to me
english.segment3: And it feels like it's almost here
english.segment4: (Chorus). Alleluia majesty. Alleluia risen king. Alleluia angels sing
english.segment5: (Verse 2). Like springtime to winter's hush. Like laughter to solemnness. Like a sun rising up. You come, You come to us
english.segment6: (Chorus). Alleluia majesty. Alleluia king of kings. Alleluia angels sing
english.segment7: (Bridge). Like a song rising up. In your heart filling up. Like a heart's not enough. For this love, for this love
english.segment8: To sing of love, to sing of love. To sing of love, love, love
english.segment9: (Chorus). Alleluia majesty. Alleluia king of kings. Alleluia angels sing
